11.3. Develop a Grid Search Framework 181
cfg = [i, o, t]
configs.append(cfg)
return configs
Listing 11.24: Example of a function for deﬁning simple forecast conﬁgurations to grid search.
We now have a framework for grid searching simple model hyperparameters via one-step
walk-forward validation. It is generic and will work for any in-memory univariate time series
provided as a list or NumPy array. We can make sure all the pieces work together by testing it
